name: Avishai Rosen
description: '''Avishai Rosen''' ([[Hebrew language|Hebrew]]: '''אבישי רוזן''') is an Israeli singer and songwriter. Beginning his career as a child with the boys choir [[:he:קינדרלעך|Kinderlach]], he switched to a solo career at age 12. He has released two solo albums, ''Ten Li Siman'' (2011) and ''Mi She'Ani Achshav'' (2016), the latter produced by [[Rami Kleinstein]], and performs with the [[A cappella|a capella]] trio 3Vocal.
